code: import axios from'axios';import{ADD_DARE,GET_DARES,DARES_LOADING,DELETE_DARE,FILTER_DARES}from'./types';export var addDare=function addDare(dare){return function(dispatch){axios.post('/api/dares',dare).then(function(res){return dispatch({type:ADD_DARE,payload:res.data});});};};export var getDares=function getDares(){return function(dispatch){dispatch(setDaresLoading());axios.get('/api/dares').then(function(res){return dispatch({type:GET_DARES,payload:res.data});});};};export var setDaresLoading=function setDaresLoading(){return{type:DARES_LOADING};};export var deleteDare=function deleteDare(id){return function(dispatch){axios.delete("/api/dares/".concat(id)).then(function(res){return dispatch({type:DELETE_DARE,payload:id});});};};export var filterDares=function filterDares(search){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:FILTER_DARES,payload:search});};};
